Articles.Content:
Hello, this game is partially based off of this forum game, where you alter a movie title and describe it.

HOW TO PLAY

Take a song, change one word in the title of the song, and then describe what the song is about. When you change the word restate the original title of the song below or next to the altered version!

RULES: NO inappropriate song titles. Follow all forum rules.

Example 

Stop Believin'. The song is about a city boy and small-town girl that get on a train at night and never meet. (Don't Stop Believin')

verything is awesome! Which is about how things that have very are awesome.

Edited April 2, 2016 by max_creative
Everything is awesome. (It's all I could come up with in 1 min.)

"Pair'o'dice city" - a song about Las Vegas (or your favorite gambling city), based on "Paradise City" by G'n'R

"Ejected" - A song about a pilot with a malfunctioning craft, based on "Elected" by Alice Cooper

Thursday: song complaining about how is not Friday yet.

(Friday)
It's raining pizza. About... Well, it's self explanatory. Based on its raining tacos. Yes that's a real song go look it up.
Pink fluffy socks dancing on rainbows. Based on pink fluffy unicorns dancing on rainbows.
